headline: Police Looking at Links to Earlier Anti-Semitic Attack
abstract: In the attack in November, a Hasidic Jewish man was stabbed and slashed as he walked to synagogue in a New York suburb.
lead_paragraph: The police are actively exploring whether a man accused of storming into a Hasidic rabbiâ€™s home and stabbing five people at a Hanukkah celebration last week in a New York City suburb was also involved in another stabbing near a synagogue a month earlier, officials said on Thursday.
